= Keybinds =
== General ==
* `Alt-Tab` - Cycle between open windows
* `Super-Enter` - Open a terminal
* `Super-q` - Close window
* `Ctrl-F1` - Go to Desk 0
* `Ctrl-F2` - Go to Desk 1
* `Ctrl-F3` - Go to Desk 2
* `Ctrl-F4` - Go to Desk 3
* `Super-1` - Go to page 1
* `Super-2` - Go to page 2
* `Super-3` - Go to page 3
* `Super-4` - Go to page 4

== Specific ==
* `Super-?` - Bring up help document
* `Super-Printscreen` - Take a screenshot
* `Super-w` - Open VimWiki
* `Super-n` - Open file manager
* `Super-m` - Open music playlist

== Tiling ==
* `Super-Shift-h` - Maximise window to the left
* `Super-Shift-l` - Maximise window to the right
* `Super-Shift-k` - Maximise window to the top
* `Super-Shift-j` - Maximise window to the bottom
* `Super-Shift-y` - Maximise window to the top left
* `Super-Shift-u` - Maximise window to the top right
* `Super-Shift-b` - Maximise window to the bottom left
* `Super-Shift-n` - Maximise window to the bottom right

== Audio Controls ==
* `Super-PageUp` - Increase volume
* `Super-PageDown` - Decrease volume
* `Super-Insert` - Toggle music
* `Super-Delete` - Stop music
* `Super-Home` - Next song
* `Super-End` - Previous song

= Mousebinds =
== Window Buttons ==
* `Click-1` - Open window options menu
* `Click-2` - Close window
* `DoubleClick-2` - Destroy window
* `Click-4` - Maximise window
* `RightClick-4` - Maximise window horizontally
* `MiddleClick-4` - Maximise window vertically
* `Click-6` - Minimise window

== Title Bar ==
* `HoldClick` - Move window
* `Click` - Raise window
* `DoubleClick` - Maximise window
* `ScrollUp` - Shade the window
* `ScrollDown` - Unshade the window
* `RightClick` - Open window options menu

== Window Frame ==
* `HoldClick` - Resize window

== Root Window ==
* `Click` - Open root menu
* `MiddleClick` - Open window list
* `RightClick` - Open window options menu

== Iconified Windows ==
* `HoldClick` - Move icon
* `RightClick` - Open window options menu
